sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Interscholastic Association Defamation Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Interscholastic Association Defamation Act.

sections.heading: Definition.  As used in this Act, "association" means the Illinois High School Association.
sections.text: Definition. As used in this Act, "association" means the Illinois High School Association.

sections.heading: Defamation.   Any association which has as its purpose
sections.text: promoting, sponsoring, regulating, or in any manner providing for interscholastic athletics or any form of athletic competition among schools and students within this State is not liable for defamation, except for actual malice.

sections.heading: Applicability.   This Act applies only to causes of actions accruing on or after its effective date.
sections.text: Applicability. This Act applies only to causes of actions accruing on or after its effective date.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect October 1, 2009.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect October 1, 2009.
